Post-Match Reflections: Davis expressed disappointment with the team's offensive performance, stating, 'This is the first game where we regressed and we were god awful offensively.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland power forward Evan Mobley recorded 25 points and five total rebounds
Shooting guard Donovan Mitchell recorded 24 points, seven assists, three total rebounds, and three steals
Center Jarett Allen gave the performance of the game, recording 20 points, 17 total rebounds, two blocks and one assist
Rookie forward Dalton Knecht scored 18 points on six-for-12 shooting and also recorded three total rebounds and one assist
LeBron James improved his performance, recording 26 points, six total rebounds, and three assists
